slides.title: Ancient India
slides.content:
**Indus Valley:** 3300-1300 BCE, Harappa, Mohenjo-daro
**Vedic Period:** Rigveda, Upanishads
**Maurya:** Chandragupta, Ashoka
**Gupta:** Golden Age, Aryabhata

slides.title: Medieval & Modern
slides.content:
**Delhi Sultanate:** 1206-1526
**Mughal:** Babur, Akbar, Shah Jahan, Aurangzeb
**British:** East India Company, 1857 Revolt
**Freedom:** Gandhi, 1947 Independence
